author: GamingBolt
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is inching ever closer to its final release and might be quite the improvement over its predecessor or an iterative disappointment based on the mixed response to the game's open beta earlier this month. Nevertheless, it's a genre that continues to draw in its players and fans, but things are a little different this time around.

Join us as we dive into what's good, what's not, and what's different in the upcoming addition to the genre's ranks and help you decide if this one is worth picking up for yourself. Whether you're a fan or a newcomer looking to dip your toes into the genre to see what the fuss is all about, you're going to want to take a look at this one.
title: Call of Duty Black Ops 7 - 15 NEW Things You Need To Know Before You Buy

author: GamingBolt
description:
If you're thinking about diving into Wreckreation's unique style of mayhem, you're going to find that there's a lot to like about Three Fields Entertainment's latest arcade racer. But there are a few issues that could be a deal breaker if those are things that really grind your gears. 

Despite excellent visuals, audio, gameplay, cars, and a general aura of charm that lend method to its madness, Wreckreation has thrown up a few performance issues and more than its share of unfair mechanics that hold it back from being a top pick among arcade racers. Nevertheless, it might be worth a try if you can look past those problems. Dive in and find out more about what makes this one tick, and what doesn't.
title: Wreckreation Review - Is This Explosive Arcade Racing Game Any Fun?
